TopicTitle: Planet Surface Textures Strange: how to eliminate a strange dotted effect?

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, I created a texture for the surface of a planet that I'm trying to create, but its surface has this strange effect. How do I remove it? The texture is in DDS DXT1 format. https://1drv.ms/f/s!Apx9C9K7sjyIhGbsvCu0SbzHCcJP  Sorry if I didn't upload a youtube link but it compresses so much the videos to make the issue invisible.


Many Tanks

You tinker with Kopernicus' near and far tiling properties to alleviate that.
Thanks for your answer. I just found out where I was wrong. The plugin that I use to save in DDS, has the generation of MipMapping disabled by default. it was simply enough to activate it.
